description: Variable LDYStaking._tiers (contracts/src/LDYStaking.sol#54) is not in mixedCase

Reentrancy in LToken.batchQueuedWithdraw() (contracts/src/LToken.sol#600-689):
	External calls:
	- underlying().safeTransfer(request.account,withdrawnAmount) (contracts/src/LToken.sol#671)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- ActivityEvent(int256(nextRequestId),request.account,Action.Withdraw,request.amount,withdrawnAmount,Status.Success) (contracts/src/LToken.sol#654-661)
markdown:
Reentrancy in [LToken.batchQueuedWithdraw()](contracts/src/LToken.sol#L600-L689):
	External calls:
	- [underlying().safeTransfer(request.account,withdrawnAmount)](contracts/src/LToken.sol#L671)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- [ActivityEvent(int256(nextRequestId),request.account,Action.Withdraw,request.amount,withdrawnAmount,Status.Success)](contracts/src/LToken.sol#L654-L661)

description:
LDYStaking._getLockDurationIncrease(address,uint256) (contracts/src/LDYStaking.sol#160-199) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	- growthRateUDS3 = (addedAmountUDS3 * _toUDS3(100)) / accountStakeUDS3 (contracts/src/LDYStaking.sol#173)
	- lockEndIncreaseUDS3 = (stakeLockDurationUDS3 * growthRateUDS3) / _toUDS3(100) (contracts/src/LDYStaking.sol#185)

	- [lockEndIncreaseUDS3 = (stakeLockDurationUDS3 * growthRateUDS3) / _toUDS3(100)](contracts/src/LDYStaking.sol#L185)
